column1: Muhandiram v Chairman, Janatha Estate Development Board1;

column2: “In an inquiry under the state lands (Recovery of
occupation that it is possessed or occupied upon
a  valid  permit  or  other  written  authority  of  the
state  granted  according  to  any  written  law,  if
this  burden  is  not  discharged,  the  only  option
open to the Magistrate is to order ejectment.”
